I have a feeling the mods will close this.

You never know.

(wow 1 page in like, 10 minutes.... not quite the hype threads on the day of launch)

- - - Updated - - -

yay mods aren't closing it.

LET'S GET THE HYPE STARTED IN HERE!
If the mods just move this to the forum games section, I wouldn't mind.
I'm actually in the Hype for that one. Almost never fired up 0.90 (or maybe for 1h every now and then, but not often)... so after a well deserved 'break', looking forward to all the new features.

OP starts hypetrain

> 
> I read that 1.0 was in **initial QA** phase so essentially that means they've started testing...
> HYPE IS INBOUND!

hypetrain derailed
Premature hype. We don't start the train rolling until it hits experimentals, and we're not there yet. So, while I appreciate the enthusiasm I'm afraid this must be locked.
